priceAndPlans.pricingModel: Consumption-based pricing with Informatica Processing Unit (IPU)
priceAndPlans.pricingDetails: With IPU pricing, you buy capacity on an IPU and/or Flex IPU consumption model to use across a range of cloud services. You can scale usage up or down as needed, manage costs effectively, and access multiple cloud services for your data management needs.
